<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Religions of the Realm](/Articles.aspx?ID=54)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 60</row>

The traditions, rituals, and customs of the natives of northern Avistan are as rich as they are steeped in divine power. Discover the faiths of the followings!
name: Religions of the Realm
